Name: White Old Fashioned
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Joerg makes this cocktail using Bacardi Neo but it also works well with the easier to obtain Bacardi Carta Blanca. If you haven't any Sexy Bitters then try with a dash of orange bitters.
History: Created in 2016 by Joerg Meyer at Le Lion - Bar de Paris, Hamburg, Germany. For a more detailed history of the Old-Fashioned cocktail , along with additional recipes, see our page.
Nutrition: One serving of White Old Fashioned contains 159 calories
